name: AccessTokenRequest
description: This resource is used to show details about an access token request

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: openIdClientId
attributes.description: The foreign key reference to an open-id-client resource.

attributes.name: grantType
attributes.description: The authentication grant type to use

attributes.name: authorizationCode
attributes.description: The authorization code that is only required in case that the grantType field is set to 'authorization_code'

attributes.name: redirectUri
attributes.description: If the redirect uri was present in the authorization code request it must also be added to the access token request

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: If the grant_type is 'password' this field is required for user authentication

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: If the grant_type is 'password' this field is required for user authentication

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: an optional scope parameter that may be added to the access token requests

attributes.name: requestHeaders
attributes.description: Contains the HTTP request headers that were send in the AccessToken request

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the HTTP header

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the HTTP header

attributes.name: requestParams
attributes.description: Contains the HTTP request parameter that were send in the AccessToken request

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the request parameter

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the request parameter

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: The response code from the AccessToken response

attributes.name: responseHeaders
attributes.description: Contains the HTTP response headers that were received with the AccessToken response

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the HTTP header

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the HTTP header

attributes.name: plainResponse
attributes.description: the plain response body of the AccessToken response

attributes.name: metaDataJson
attributes.description: the json string that represents the metadata of the openId provider
